mapper.sql: tid, status, type, seller_nick, buyer_nick, created, modified, jdp_hashcode, jdp_created, jdp_modified
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from jdp_tb_trade
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from jdp_tb_trade
order by ${orderByClause}

select * from jdp_tb_trade
where jdp_Modified BETWEEN str_to_date('${startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND str_to_date('${endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where jdp_Modified >= str_to_date('${startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where jdp_Modified <= str_to_date('${endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
limit ${pageNum},${pageSize}

select count(tid) from jdp_tb_trade
where jdp_Modified BETWEEN str_to_date('${startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND str_to_date('${endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where jdp_Modified >= str_to_date('${startDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
where jdp_Modified <= str_to_date('${endDate}','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.insert: insert into jdp_tb_trade (tid, status, type, seller_nick, buyer_nick, created, modified, jdp_hashcode, jdp_created, jdp_modified, jdp_response) values (#{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jdpHashcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdpCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jdpModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jdpResponse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into jdp_tb_trade
tid,
status,
type,
seller_nick,
buyer_nick,
created,
modified,
jdp_hashcode,
jdp_created,
jdp_modified,
jdp_response,

mapper.update:
update jdp_tb_trade
tid = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_nick = #{record.sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_nick = #{record.buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jdp_hashcode = #{record.jdpHashcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jdp_created = #{record.jdpCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jdp_modified = #{record.jdpModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jdp_response = #{record.jdpResponse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update jdp_tb_trade set tid = #{record.tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_nick = #{record.sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_nick = #{record.buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jdp_hashcode = #{record.jdpHashcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdp_created = #{record.jdpCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jdp_modified = #{record.jdpModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jdp_response = #{record.jdpResponse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update jdp_tb_trade
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_nick = #{sellerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_nick = #{buyerNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

jdp_created = #{jdpCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jdp_modified = #{jdpModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jdp_response = #{jdpResponse,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
